name: Out Through
description:
Sometimes, in life, we face something that we think will forever leave a scar on us, prying on our joy, on our happiness, on our sanity... but sometimes even the darkest moments hide a way out.

Sometimes the only way out really is through...

---

"Out, Through" is a game by MargheriTeam, created during the Ludum Dare Jam 48 in response to the "Deeper and deeper" theme.

---

Credits:

Enrico Andreuccetti (Game Design)

Celia S.Bode (Concept Art)
